a.title: Superintendent Community Accent Radio (WFCO) Interviews (through Oct 2019)

li.a: Superintendent Community Accent Radio (WFCO) Interviews (through Oct 2019)

span.p:
The Governor has announced that schools will remain closed for the rest of the school year. LHS and Junior High students will continue instruction online. New Elementary learning packets will be available May 4-6. Packet pickup information will be communicated later.
Although this decision was made to keep us all safe, our hearts go out to our school families, our staff, and especially our Seniors.
Steve Wigton
Superintendent
